TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MethodRental extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodRental

summary.span: 提供一個交換方法主體實作的快速方法 (如果是類別的方法)。

span.span: Provides a fast way to swap method body implementation given a method of a class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SwapMethodBody (Type cls, int methodtoken, IntPtr rgIL, int methodSize, int flags);
.method public static hidebysig void SwapMethodBody(class System.Type cls, int32 methodtoken, native int rgIL, int32 methodSize, int32 flags) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SwapMethodBody (cls As Type, methodtoken As Integer, rgIL As IntPtr, methodSize As Integer, flags As Integer)
public: static void SwapMethodBody(Type ^ cls, int methodtoken, IntPtr rgIL, int methodSize, int flags);

param.name: cls
param.span: 包含方法的類別。

span.span: The class containing the method.

param.name: methodtoken
param.span: 方法的語彙基元。

span.span: The token for the method.

param.name: rgIL
param.span: 方法的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the method.

param.span: 這應該包括方法標頭。

span.span: This should include the method header.

param.name: methodSize
param.span: 新方法主體的大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The size of the new method body in bytes.

param.name: flags
param.span: 控制交換的旗標。

span.span: Flags that control the swapping.

param.span: 請參閱常數的定義。

span.span: See the definitions of the constants.
Swaps the body of a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法使用這個方法來交換全域方法的主體。You cannot use this method to swap the body of a global method. 建立包含正進行交換的方法主體的類型的動態模組的用戶端只可以呼叫的方法。The method can only be called by the client that created the dynamic module that contains the type whose method's body is being swapped. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何為新的主體交換方法主體。The following example illustrates how to swap a method body for a new body. 它也說明如何取得現有方法的方法語彙基元，以及如何建構 blob （位元組)，代表要傳遞至 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 程式碼`SwapMethodBody`。It also illustrates how to obtain a method token for an existing method and how to construct a blob of bytes representing the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) code to be passed to `SwapMethodBody`. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
The type is not complete.

exception.span: 小於 1 或大於 4128767 (3effff 十六進位)。

span.span: is less than one or greater than 4128767 (3effff hex).
to execute unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: void _MethodRental.GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodRental.GetIDsOfNames([in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, native int rgszNames, unsigned int32 cNames, unsigned int32 lcid, native int rgDispId) cil managed
Sub GetIDsOfNames (ByRef riid As Guid, rgszNames As IntPtr, cNames As UInteger, lcid As UInteger, rgDispId As IntPtr) Implements _MethodRental.GetIDsOfNames

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._MethodRental.GetIDsOfNames(Guid % riid, IntPtr rgszNames, System::UInt32 cNames, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr rgDispId) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_MethodRental::GetIDsOfNames;

param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必須是 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

span.span: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.

param.name: cNames
param.span: 要對應的名稱計數。

span.span: Count of the names to be mapped.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret the names.

param.name: rgDispId
param.span: 呼叫端配置的陣列，用於接收對應於名稱的 ID。

span.span: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.

summary.span: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 方法使用 COM IDispatch 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。

span.span: The method is called late-bound using the COM IDispatch interface.

param.name: iTInfo
param.span: 要傳回的類型資訊。

param.name: ppTInfo
param.span: 接收要求的類型資訊物件的指標。

span.span: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.

summary.span: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

span.span: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.

span.span: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.

summary.span: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

span.span: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.

Sub Invoke (dispIdMember As UInteger, ByRef riid As Guid, lcid As UInteger, wFlags As Short, pDispParams As IntPtr, pVarResult As IntPtr, pExcepInfo As IntPtr, puArgErr As IntPtr) Implements _MethodRental.Invoke

param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

summary.span: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

span.span: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
